title: Fresh Air Remembers British Rock Keyboardist Ian McLagan
teaser: McLagan, who died at 69, helped define the sound of '60s British rock with his bands Small Faces and Faces. He toured with the Rolling Stones, Dylan and Billy Bragg. He appeared on Fresh Air in 2004.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
